imageStack_parameters.name: dimension_order
imageStack_parameters.documentation: This describes the order of values associated with each dimension of the imageStack. Default is for an YXCZT stack.

imageStack_parameters.name: dimension_labels
imageStack_parameters.documentation: The labels associated with each dimension of the imageStack as a comma-separated list. Default is for an YXCZT stack.

imageStack_parameters.name: dimension_size
imageStack_parameters.documentation: The length of each dimension in (e.g. [1024, 1024, 3, 20, 10000] which correspond to [numPixels, numPixels, numChannels, numPlanes, numTimepoints] in the default dimension order).

imageStack_parameters.name: dimension_scale
imageStack_parameters.documentation: The spatial scale of each dimension (e.g. [2, 2, 1, 10, 1]) in units of dimension_scale_unit for YXCZT stack.

imageStack_parameters.name: dimension_scale_units
imageStack_parameters.documentation: The units of each dimension as a comma-separated list (e.g. 'millimeter,millimeter,dimensionless,micrometer,second') for YXCZT stack.

imageStack_parameters.name: data_type
imageStack_parameters.documentation: The data type of the imageStack (e.g 'uint8', 'logical', 'double').

imageStack_parameters.name: data_limits
imageStack_parameters.documentation: The minimum and maximum value for that data type (e.g. [0 255], [0 1]).

imageStack_parameters.name: timestamp
imageStack_parameters.documentation: The time that the first image in the imageStack was acquired specified as a datenum (if global clock) or in seconds (if local clock).

imageStack_parameters.name: clocktype
imageStack_parameters.documentation: The clock type of the timestamp. Use a global clock if available.
